message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand that $150 might be a bit steep, but I still think this product is worth more than $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $125 for it.
I understand that you're still not satisfied with the price, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $130. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $125 again, as it's the best I can do.
I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm still willing to try to find a middle ground. I'm willing to meet you at $127.50, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I understand your frustration, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $125 and $127.50, so I'll offer $126.25.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I still think I can get a bit more. I'm willing to meet you at $126.75, but that's my final offer.
